name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper vs Gedatsu Battle Begins
keyMoments.description: Chopper confronts Gedatsu in the Ordeal of Swamp, beginning his first major solo battle against one of Enel's priests.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Chopper's first solo battle against a major enemy, testing his abilities without support from stronger crew members.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Uses Rumble Ball and Jumping Point
keyMoments.description: Chopper consumes a Rumble Ball and transforms into Jumping Point to evade Gedatsu's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's strategic use of his transformations in combat.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Discovers Gedatsu's Weakness
keyMoments.description: Chopper realizes Gedatsu's feet are his weak point and devises a strategy to exploit this vulnerability.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's growth as a tactician, analyzing his opponent to find weaknesses.

keyMoments.title: Arm Point: Kokutei Cross Debut
keyMoments.description: Chopper transforms to Arm Point and uses his new technique Kokutei Cross to strike Gedatsu's weak point.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a new named attack in Chopper's combat arsenal.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Defeats Gedatsu
keyMoments.description: Chopper successfully defeats Gedatsu, who falls into his own swamp cloud. Chopper celebrates his first major solo victory.
keyMoments.significance: Chopper's coming-of-age moment as a pirate, proving his capabilities and gaining confidence.
keyMoments.quote: I finally did it! I'm a real pirate now!

abilities.description: In Arm Point form, Chopper delivers a powerful cross-strike attack targeting the enemy's weak points.

reveals.information: Chopper debuts his Kokutei Cross technique in Arm Point
Chopper achieves his first major solo victory, proving his worth as a pirate

keyMoments.title: Gedatsu Introduces His Ordeal
keyMoments.description: Gedatsu confronts Chopper and introduces himself as a priest with the Ordeal of Swamp, though he frequently forgets to speak out loud.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Gedatsu's personality as both threatening and incompetent.
keyMoments.quote: I am Gedatsu, and this is my Ordeal of Swamp!

keyMoments.title: Swamp Cloud Burger Technique
keyMoments.description: Gedatsu demonstrates his signature Numagumo Burger technique, creating swamp clouds that trap victims.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases unique Skypiean combat techniques using specialized clouds.

keyMoments.title: Jet Punch with Jet Dials
keyMoments.description: Gedatsu uses Jet Dials installed in his elbows to deliver extremely fast and powerful punches.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Jet Dial technology in combat.

keyMoments.title: Gedatsu Uses Mantra
keyMoments.description: Gedatsu demonstrates his Mantra (Observation Haki) ability to predict Chopper's movements.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Gedatsu possesses advanced abilities despite his incompetence.

keyMoments.title: Gedatsu's Defeat
keyMoments.description: After being hit by Chopper's attack, Gedatsu accidentally propels himself deep into the swamp cloud using his Milky Dial, defeating himself.
keyMoments.significance: Comedic defeat that showcases Gedatsu's incompetence despite his considerable power.

abilities.description: Creates swamp clouds that trap victims. The more they struggle, the deeper they sink.
Uses Jet Dials installed in elbows to deliver incredibly fast punches.
Ability to sense and predict enemy movements before they happen.
Uses Milky Dials installed in gloves and shoes to fly.

reveals.information: Gedatsu demonstrates multiple dial-based techniques and Mantra
Gedatsu is extremely absent-minded and incompetent despite his power
Gedatsu is defeated by Chopper and falls into the swamp cloud

keyMoments.title: Robin Discovers Shandora's Name
keyMoments.description: Robin discovers a monument in the ruins that reveals the ancient city's name is Shandora.
keyMoments.significance: Major archaeological discovery connecting to the larger mysteries of the One Piece world.
keyMoments.quote: This monument... it says the name of this ancient city is Shandora.

keyMoments.title: Robin Seeks the True History
keyMoments.description: Robin takes detailed notes on the ruins, expressing hope to find clues to the True History.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Robin's core motivation and the importance of Shandora to understanding the Void Century.
keyMoments.quote: I may find some clue to the True History here that I couldn't find on the sea below.

keyMoments.title: Yama Confronts Robin
keyMoments.description: The large Shandia warrior Yama appears before Robin as she studies the ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up conflict between Robin and the Shandia warriors.

reveals.information: Robin discovers the ancient city is named Shandora
Robin continues her search for clues to the True History in Skypiea

keyMoments.title: Yama Appears Before Robin
keyMoments.description: Yama, a large Shandia warrior, appears before Robin in the ruins of Shandora.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a new antagonist and threat to the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Yama is a Shandia warrior fighting to reclaim their homeland

keyMoments.title: Aisa Uses Mantra to Sense Defeat
keyMoments.description: Aisa uses her Mantra ability to hear Gedatsu's defeated voice from afar.

abilities.description: Advanced ability to sense voices and presences from a distance.
